title: Looking for Plat + Players Ranked team.
body:
Looking for plat players for semi serious ranked team. 

Roles needed:
Support: N/A
Jungle: N/A
Top: N/A
Mid: N/A
ADC: Taken

I will update thread when roles have been filled out. msg me if you want to sub.

replies.body: would you take a Gold 1 for Jungle??
